 33
 34namespace vsip
 35{
 36namespace impl
 37{
 38
 39template <dimension_type> 
 40struct Freqswap_worker;
 41
 42/// Specialization for 1D swap
 43template <>
 44struct Freqswap_worker<1>
 45{
 46  template <typename ResultBlock, typename ArgumentBlock>
 47  static void apply(ResultBlock &out, ArgumentBlock const &in)
 48  {
 49    length_type const M = in.size();
 50
 51    index_type const ia = M % 2;  // adjustment to get source index
 52
 53    typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(M / 2);
 54
 55    for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
 56    {
 57      // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
 58      typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia);
 59      out.put(ii, in.get(i));
 60      out.put(i, tmp);
 61    }
 62
 63    // if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
 64    if (ia)
 65      out.put(M-1, mid);
 66  }
 67};
 68
 69/// Specialization for 2D swap
 70template <>
 71struct Freqswap_worker<2>
 72{
 73  template <typename ResultBlock, typename ArgumentBlock>
 74  static void apply(ResultBlock &out, ArgumentBlock const &in)
 75  {
 76    length_type const M = in.size(2, 0);
 77    length_type const N = in.size(2, 1);
 78
 79    index_type const ia = M % 2;  // adjustment to get source index
 80    index_type const ja = N % 2;
 81
 82    if (is_same_block(in, out))
 83    {
 84      // If in-place, use algorithm that trades O(1) temporary storage
 85      // for extra copies.
 86
 87      // First swap rows.
 88      for (index_type i=0; i < M; ++i)
 89      {
 90	typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(i, N / 2);
 91
 92	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
 93	{
 94	  // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
 95	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(i, jj + ja);
 96	  out.put(i, jj, in.get(i, j));
 97	  out.put(i, j, tmp);
 98	}
 99
100	// if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
101	if (ja) out.put(i, N-1, mid);
102      }
103
104      // Second, swap columns.
105      for (index_type j=0; j < N; ++j)
106      {
107	typename ArgumentBlock::value_type mid = in.get(M / 2, j);
108
109	for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
110	{
111	  // Be careful to allow 'out' to alias 'in'
112	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia, j);
113	  out.put(ii, j, in.get(i, j));
114	  out.put(i,  j, tmp);
115	}
116
117	// if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
118	if (ia) out.put(M-1, j, mid);
119      }
120    }
121    else
122    {
123      // equiv. to out[i,j] = in[(M/2 + i) mod M,(N/2 + i) mod N], 
124      //   where i = 0 --> M - 1 and j = 0 --> N - 1
125      for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
126      {
127	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
128	{
129	  typename ArgumentBlock::value_type tmp = in.get(ii + ia, jj + ja);
130	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i, j));
131	  out.put(i, j, tmp);
132	  tmp = in.get(ii + ia, j);
133	  out.put(ii, j, in.get(i, jj + ja));
134	  out.put(i, jj, tmp);
135	}
136      }
137
138      // if odd, fill in the last row/column(s)
139      if (ia)
140      {
141	index_type i = M / 2;
142	index_type ii = M - 1;
143	for (index_type j = 0, jj = N / 2; j < N / 2; ++j, ++jj)
144	{
145	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i, j));
146	  out.put(ii,  j, in.get(i,jj + ja));
147	}
148      }
149      if (ja)
150      {
151	index_type j = N / 2;
152	index_type jj = N - 1;
153	for (index_type i = 0, ii = M / 2; i < M / 2; ++i, ++ii)
154	{
155	  out.put(ii, jj, in.get(i      , j));
156	  out.put( i, jj, in.get(ii + ia, j));
157	}
158      }
159      if (ia && ja) out.put(M - 1, N - 1, in.get(M / 2, N / 2));
160    }
161  }
162};
163} // namespace vsip::impl
164} // namespace vsip
165
166namespace vsip_csl
167{
168namespace dispatcher
169{
170#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
171template<>
172struct List<op::freqswap>
173{
174  typedef Make_type_list<be::cuda,
175			 be::generic>::type type;
176};
177#endif
178
179template <typename ResultBlock,
180	  typename ArgumentBlock>
181struct Evaluator<op::freqswap, be::generic,
182                 void(ResultBlock &, ArgumentBlock const &)>
183{
184  static bool const ct_valid = true;
185  static bool rt_valid(ResultBlock &, ArgumentBlock const &) { return true;}
186
187  static void exec(ResultBlock &result, ArgumentBlock const &argument)
188  {
189    vsip::impl::Freqswap_worker<ArgumentBlock::dim>::apply(result, argument);
190  }
191};
192} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
193} // namespace vsip_csl
194
195namespace vsip
196{
197namespace impl
198{
199
200template <typename Block>
201class Freqswap
202{
203  typedef typename View_block_storage<Block>::plain_type block_ref_type;
204
205public:
206  typedef typename Block::map_type map_type;
207  typedef typename Block::value_type result_type;
208  static dimension_type const dim = Block::dim;
209
210  typedef Freqswap<typename Distributed_local_block<Block>::type> local_type;
211
212  Freqswap(block_ref_type in) : in_(in) {}
213
214  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const
215  {
216    assert(block_dim == dim);
217    return in_.size(block_dim, d);
218  }
219  length_type size() const { return in_.size();}
220  map_type const &map() const { return in_.map();}
221  Block const &arg() const { return in_;}
222
223  template <typename ResultBlock>
224  void apply(ResultBlock &out) const
225  {
226    namespace d = vsip_csl::dispatcher;
227#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
228    Evaluator<d::op::freqswap, d::be::generic,
229      void(ResultBlock&, Block const&)>::exec(out, in_);
230#else
231    vsip_csl::dispatch<d::op::freqswap, void, ResultBlock &, Block const &>(out, in_);
232#endif
233  }
234  local_type local() const { return local_type(get_local_block(in_));}
235
236private:
237  block_ref_type in_;
238};
239
240} // namespace impl
241
242/// Swaps halves of a vector, or quadrants of a matrix, to remap zero 
243/// frequencies from the origin to the middle.
244template <template <typename, typename> class const_View,
245          typename T,
246          typename B>
247const_View<T, impl::expr::Unary<impl::Freqswap, B> const>
248freqswap(const_View<T, B> in) VSIP_NOTHROW
249{
250  typedef impl::expr::Unary<impl::Freqswap, B> const block_type;
251  impl::Freqswap<B> fs(in.block());
252  return const_View<T, block_type>(block_type(fs));
253}
254
255} // namespace vsip
